title: SOLD - 1889 E.R. Williams Pud Galvin (HOF) SGC 40
author: Archive

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1889 E.R. Williams Pud Galvin (HOF) SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Phil Garry
Up for sale tonight is a very scarce, early card of Hall of Fame pitcher, Pud Galvin. This beauty has been graded an SGC 40 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guarantee Company. This is 1 of only 3 of these cards ever graded by SGC. My asking price for this card is $800.00 dlvd. The first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: vguerrerobb@yahoo.com. Thank you for your consideration.


[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/PGalvin.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/PGalvinB.jpg[/IMG]
